Kim Yong Sun meets president of S. Korean Hyundai Asan 
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sun, chairman of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, Wednesday met and had a conversation with Jong Mong Hon, president of the Hyundai Asan of South Korea, and his party in a compatriotic atmosphere.
 Present there were Ri Jong Hyok, vice-chairman of the committee, and other officials concerned.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Lithuanian President 
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Jan. 13 sent a congratulatory message to Rolandas Paksas on his election as President of Lithuania.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples, and wished the president great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and well-being of its people.

articles.content:
Hong Song Nam congratulates Brazilian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Jose Dirceu upon his appointment as Brazilian Prime Minister.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets special envoy of UN Secretary General
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with Moris Strong, special envoy of the UN Secretary General, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were an official concerned and the resident coordinator of the UN and resident representative of the UNDP here.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Brazilian FM
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Celso Luis Nunes Amorim upon his appointment as Foreign Minister of Brazil.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in fulfilling his new duty.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets special envoy of UN Secretary General
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Moris Strong, special envoy of the UN Secretary General, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Choe Su Hon, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.    
 At the meeting the special envoy conveyed new year greetings and best wishes from UN Secretary General Kofi Annan to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

Paek Nam Sun meets with new Indonesian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today met and had a talk with Hendrati Sukendar Munthe, new Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.
